review: It functions fine & is SUPER easy to use with my smart phone.  My only challenge is Amazon itself bringing back movies on the search that cost per view.  Netflix movies are included.  Amazon Prime is pay me $90/year + per movie?  I'll use red box if I wanted to pay per view.
author: Steve Schlangen

review: Worked great once I figured out how to put it on the TV.
author: Jackie Dorsey "moondors"

review: I can't get jw/tv/broadcasting on this like I can on Roku.
author: Kathy Rabel

review: I have 50 mbs internet speed connection. But YouTube is very slow in Amazon stick.
author: muthu
